title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet is not returning expected class
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet is not returning expected class. The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: When running the code on Tomcat 7.0.0, the output is "MySomeAnn" instead of "MySomeClass". This behavior is not in line with the Servlet 3.0 specification. The code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
